Hyperliquid‚Äôs native token $HYPE  jumped about 3.5% recently after the project revealed a major token distribution plan.  As part of a 24-month monthly vesting schedule, Hyperliquid Labs will start distributing 1.2 million unstaked #HYPE  tokens to the team on January 6, 2026. This is the first step in a planned process to reward contributions.   The goal of this regular monthly distribution is to maintain market stability and promote long-term growth. Holders were both excited and cautious about the announcement, and opinions on possible price consequences were divided among the community. #Hyperliquid  #MarketUpdate  #CryptoInvesting
